org.jgentleframework.context.aop.support
Interface Matching

All Superinterfaces:
MetadataControl
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClassMatching, FieldMatching, MethodConstructorMatching<T>, ParameterMatching<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMatching, BasicFieldMatchingAspectPair, BasicMethodConstructorMatchingAspectPair, BasicParameterMatchingAspectPair, BasicTypeMatchingAspectPair
public interface Matching
extends MetadataControl

Represents a matching containing all necessary attributes to the call of Matcher.matches(Object) of specified Matcher. Also, It is an extension of MetadataControls so it can store any MetadataControl in it to provide additional information for Matcher implementation to perform.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
